document_data.title: A Blight in the Darkness
document_data.design: [[Patricia Barnabie]]{{Cite adventurers league/A Blight in the Darkness|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''A Blight in the Darkness''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Plague of Ancients|Plague of Ancients]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Icewind Dale]], and is an adventure designed for 5{{th}} to 10{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''The wicked owlbear was nearly defeated; now it’s time to finish the deed and destroy her and her master once and for all. But first, you must find them. Track them down and save Ten Towns! Death lies to those who wait, but to those who fight boldly, a much worse end awaits.''|}}
